mapper.insert:
select seq_counselingschedule.nextval from dual
insert into counselingschedule values(#{counScheId},to_date(#{counScheStartdate},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS'),#{counScheDln},#{counScheAddress},#{counScheContent})
mapper.select: select count(*) from counselingschedule INNER JOIN hospital on coun_sche_dln = hdln and coun_sche_address = haddress where hname like '%'|| #{searchBar} ||'%' and TO_CHAR(coun_sche_startdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') between #{sdate} and #{edate} and TO_CHAR(coun_sche_startdate,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS')

select coun_sche_startdate, hname from counselingschedule INNER JOIN hospital on coun_sche_dln = hdln and coun_sche_address = haddress where TO_CHAR(coun_sche_startdate,'yyyymmdd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd') and TO_CHAR(coun_sche_startdate,'HH24:MI:SS') > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24:MI:SS') and rownum < 5 ORDER BY TO_CHAR(coun_sche_startdate,'yyyymmdd HH24:MI:SS') desc
